title: Travel Preparation
description: Learn A2+ sentences about preparing for a trip.

steps.pinyin: wǒ zhǔn bèi xià zhōu chū qù lǚ xíng.
steps.english_hint: I'm preparing to travel next week.

steps.teacher: 我需要先訂飯店，不然可能沒有房間。
expected_answer: 我需要先訂飯店，不然可能沒有房間。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xū yào xiān dìng fàn diàn, bù rán kě néng méi yǒu fáng jiān.
steps.english_hint: I need to book a hotel first, otherwise there may be no rooms.

steps.teacher: 我打算帶一些方便的衣服。
expected_answer: 我打算帶一些方便的衣服。
steps.pinyin: wǒ dǎ suàn dài yì xiē fāng biàn de yī fú.
steps.english_hint: I plan to bring some comfortable clothes.

steps.teacher: 因為天氣可能變化大，我會帶外套。
expected_answer: 因為天氣可能變化大，我會帶外套。
steps.pinyin: yīn wèi tiān qì kě néng biàn huà dà, wǒ huì dài wài tào.
steps.english_hint: Because the weather may change a lot, I'll bring a jacket.

steps.teacher: 我會先查一下當地的交通方式。
expected_answer: 我會先查一下當地的交通方式。
steps.pinyin: wǒ huì xiān chá yí xià dāng dì de jiāo tōng fāng shì.
steps.english_hint: I will check the local transportation first.

steps.teacher: 出門前我會把手機充滿電。
expected_answer: 出門前我會把手機充滿電。
steps.pinyin: chū mén qián wǒ huì bǎ shǒu jī chōng mǎn diàn.
steps.english_hint: Before leaving, I will fully charge my phone.

steps.teacher: 我會帶一些零食，路上比較方便。
expected_answer: 我會帶一些零食，路上比較方便。
steps.pinyin: wǒ huì dài yì xiē líng shí, lù shàng bǐ jiào fāng biàn.
steps.english_hint: I'll bring some snacks; it's more convenient on the way.

steps.teacher: 如果時間夠，我想去幾個景點看看。
expected_answer: 如果時間夠，我想去幾個景點看看。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ shí jiān gòu, wǒ xiǎng qù jǐ gè jǐng diǎn kàn kàn.
steps.english_hint: If there's enough time, I want to visit a few attractions.

steps.teacher: 我會帶水瓶，這樣比較環保。
expected_answer: 我會帶水瓶，這樣比較環保。
steps.pinyin: wǒ huì dài shuǐ píng, zhè yàng bǐ jiào huán bǎo.
steps.english_hint: I'll bring a water bottle; it's more eco-friendly.

steps.teacher: 我已經把重要的文件放進包包裡了。
expected_answer: 我已經把重要的文件放進包包裡了。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng bǎ zhòng yào de wén jiàn fàng jìn bāo bao lǐ le.
steps.english_hint: I already put the important documents in my bag.

review.summary: You learned natural A2+ travel preparation sentences.
review.mission: Next lesson: Shopping vocabulary and sentences!
